description: Abejita Perú is an innovative company, focusing on the beekeeping sector. The initiative aims to produce and market bee products, including honey, pollen, and waxed fabrics, which serve as an eco-friendly alternative to plastic. The idea for Abejita Perú emerged from reflections on food consumption and plastic use during the pandemic, leading to an exploraition of sustainable practices in beekeeping. Abejita Perú not only focuses on product innovation but also emphasizes the importance of supporting local beekeepers and promoting the ecological benefits of beekeeping. The initiative aims to raise awareness about the significance of bees in food security and environmental conservation, while also empowering women in the beekeeping sector.
name: Abejita Perú
